accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the system

clarity.description: How clear and understandable is the solution provided by the system

efficiency.description: The conciseness and brevity of the solution provided by the system

speed.description: The time taken by the system to provide the solution

level_appropriateness.description: How well-suited the solution provided by the system is for the given problem's level

error_handling.description: How well the system identifies and addresses possible errors in the problem
